dataList.dlg: Those WARP trains tend to be rather cramped, don't you think?
I don't have much trouble getting up in the morning... But doing the same work day after day got old pretty fast.
Mmm~ It's nice out today! The shop I visited serves great drinks, too. ... I'm gonna have to go back inside and prepare to clean up more trains, though.
You know, sometimes I lose track of time working late into the night for those night trains. Train platforms always so brightly lit and all.
Grandma told me to work here, but it does get a little boring doing the same things over and over~
I wonder if we'll ever get company sponsored trips? We're train cleaner agents, so it would be pretty appropriate. Oh, not that I want to take the WARP Trains, of course~
Aw~ Everyone's been getting increasingly quiet. Their faces look gloomy, too... I wonder if there's a flu going around?
Whew... Everyone's in pieces again. Apparently there was this one time when the passengers were praying in their seats, all nice and gentle. What an easy job that must've been!

Is the train cleaning job difficult? Well... it can be, when it comes to cleaning up the weirder passengers.
Oh, you meant like psychologically? Hm... Nah, it's just a job, right? I don't really think about it.
Mm, I'll be checking the letters from my family, if you won't mind~
Oh, is this a new lesson? I hope it's about something new for once~
I'm all ready to clean~
Time to start cleaning.
Oh dear~ You're not supposed to come in while we're cleaning up.
Taking care of problem passengers.
Stay calm and stay down, now~
Ouch!
Okay, let's get their limbs and torsos over here~
Ah... It was... supposed to be a simple cleanup...?
Hmhmm. That was simple.
Strange... The manuals taught me to do it this way.
Alright, now that that's over with, I should visit a café for a short break.
Ohh~ We've finished today's job much faster than usual, haven't we? Maybe you have the makings of a cleanup agent~
The passengers were a little too rowdy this time...
